bioconda.name: bioconductor-rrho
bioconda.summary: Inference on agreement between ordered lists

biotools.summary: The package is aimed at inference on the amount of agreement in two sorted lists using the Rank-Rank Hypergeometric Overlap test.

bioschemas.name: RRHO
bioschemas.summary: The package is aimed at inference on the amount of agreement in two sorted lists using the Rank-Rank Hypergeometric Overlap test.
